item.title: 霍尼韦尔宣布Quantinuum计划申请首次公开募股
item.description: 霍尼韦尔周三表示，其控股的量子计算子公司Quantinuum计划向美国证券监管机构提交保密性的首次公开募股（IPO）文件草案。【原文：Honeywell ​said on ‌Wednesday it plans ‌for its ​majority-owned quantum ‍computing unit Quantinuum ⁠to ‍confidentially file draft ‌IPO ‌papers with ⁠the ⁠U.S. ​securities regulator.】

item.title: 比利时网络安全初创企业Aikido在最新融资轮中跻身独角兽行列
item.description: 比利时网络安全初创企业Aikido Security周三宣布，已从以科技领域私募股权公司DST Global为首的投资者处筹集6000万美元资金，公司估值达10亿美元，成为2026年欧洲首批新晋独角兽企业之一。【原文：Belgium's Aikido Security has raised $60 million from investors led by tech-focused ​private equity firm DST Global at a ‌valuation of $1 billion, the cybersecurity startup said on Wednesday, making it among Europe's first new unicorns of 2026.】

item.title: 零售投资者涌入内存芯片制造商，人工智能热潮挤压供应，推高价格
item.description: 散户投资者在1月份大幅增持美国内存和数据存储芯片制造商的股票，延续了2025年以来的强劲势头。市场预期人工智能基础设施需求的激增将导致供应紧张并推高价格。【原文：Retail investors ramped up buying of U.S. ​memory and data storage chipmakers in January, following 2025's strong momentum on expectations ‌that booming artificial intelligence infrastructure demand will tighten supply and lift prices.】

item.title: 美国银行利润攀升，动荡市场中交易量激增
item.description: 美国银行利润上升，因其交易员在第四季度从客户活动增加中获得更多收入，这得益于市场波动性加剧。【原文：Bank of America's profit rose, as its traders brought in more revenue from spurred client activity in the fourth quarter due to increased volatility in the markets.】

item.title: 瑞安航空排除为飞机配备马斯克星链互联网服务的计划
item.description: 瑞安航空周三宣布，不会在其飞机上安装埃隆·马斯克的星链卫星互联网服务，理由是天线造成的阻力会增加燃油成本，且该航空公司航班航程较短。【原文：Ryanair on Wednesday ruled out equipping its jets with Elon Musk’s Starlink satellite internet service, citing the impact of fuel costs from drag caused by the antenna and the short length of its flights.】

item.title: 晨间竞拍：买到腿软
item.description: 作者：马克·琼斯，全球市场通讯员【原文：By Marc Jones, global markets correspondent】

item.title: 富国银行利润攀升，得益于利息收入增长
item.description: 富国银行第四季度利润增长，得益于贷款规模扩大及利息收入增加，同时其消费和商业业务的关键领域均实现增长。【原文：Wells Fargo's profit rose in the fourth quarter as it boosted loans and earned more from interest payments, while growing ​in key areas in its consumer and commercial businesses.】

item.title: 特朗普在降价问题上遭遇总统权力的限制
item.description: 美国总统拥有巨大权力，而唐纳德·特朗普在过去一年里大幅扩大了行政权限。但在一个领域，他正体会到总统权力的局限——即快速降低民众生活成本的能力。【原文：The U.S. president wields enormous power and Donald Trump has greatly expanded his executive authority over the past year. But there is one area where he is learning the limits of presidential power - his ability to quickly lower the cost of living.】

item.title: 女性权益组织呼吁苹果、谷歌将X和Grok应用从应用商店下架
item.description: 由女性团体、科技监督机构和进步活动家组成的联盟，正呼吁谷歌母公司Alphabet和苹果公司将其旗下社交媒体平台X及其相关聊天机器人Grok从应用商店下架。【原文：A coalition of women's groups, tech watchdogs, and progressive activists is calling on Alphabet owner Google and Apple to remove the social media site X and its related chatbot, Grok, from their app stores.】

item.title: 华尔街期货下跌，大型银行财报发布在即
item.description: 周三美国股指期货小幅下挫，投资者正为花旗集团、美国银行和富国银行的财报发布做准备，而当日晚些时候公布的零售销售和生产者价格数据预计将为经济健康状况提供新的洞察。【原文：U.S. stock ‌index futures dipped on Wednesday as investors braced for earnings from Citigroup, Bank of America and Wells Fargo, while retail sales and producer price data later in the day were expected to offer fresh insight on the health of the economy.】

item.title: 世界经济论坛调查显示，经济对抗取代武装冲突成为首要风险
item.description: 国家间经济对抗及其后果在周三发布的世界经济论坛年度风险感知调查中位居榜首，取代武装冲突成为全球1300多名受访专家最关切的问题。【原文：Economic confrontation between nations and its consequences topped the World Economic Forum's (WEF) annual risks perception survey released on Wednesday, replacing armed conflict as the number one concern of 1,300-plus experts surveyed worldwide.】

item.title: 印度Infosys公司第三季度营收超预期，上调全年业绩预测区间
item.description: 印孚瑟斯周三公布的第三季度营收超出预期，得益于金融服务客户对技术需求的回升。【原文：Infosys reported better-than-expected third-quarter revenue on Wednesday, helped by a pickup in tech demand from its financial services clients.】

item.title: 巴西警方突袭行动锁定Vorcaro公司，调查涉及Banco Master银行案，消息人士称
item.description: 巴西联邦警察周三对商人丹尼尔·沃卡罗执行了搜查和扣押令，他是Banco Master银行的控股股东。知情人士向路透社透露，这是对该贷款机构调查的一部分。【原文：Brazil's federal police on ​Wednesday served search ‌and seizure warrants against businessman Daniel Vorcaro, Banco ‌Master's controlling shareholder, as ​part of a probe into the ‍lender, sources familiar with the matter told ⁠Reuters.】

item.title: 欧洲央行委员雷恩称美联储丧失独立性将推高通胀、威胁金融稳定
item.description: 芬兰央行行长奥利·雷恩周三表示，美国联邦储备委员会若丧失独立性将推高通胀，甚至可能危及金融稳定。他同时对美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔表达了"完全支持"。【原文：Any loss of U.S. Federal Reserve independence would push up inflation and might even endanger financial stability, Finnish central bank Governor Olli Rehn said on Wednesday as he expressed "full solidarity" with Fed Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 中国小鹏汽车计划在2026年实现最高60万辆的汽车销量目标
item.description: 中国科技门户网站36Kr周三援引近期内部战略会议消息报道称，中国电动汽车制造商小鹏汽车今年销售目标定为55万至60万辆。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Xpeng is targeting sales of 550,000-600,000 vehicles this year, Chinese tech portal 36Kr reported on Wednesday, citing a recent internal strategy meeting.】

item.title: 壳牌与埃克森美孚叫停向维亚罗能源出售英国天然气资产的交易
item.description: 壳牌公司周三在一份声明中表示，该公司与埃克森美孚已暂停向维亚罗能源出售其在英国北海南部天然气资产的计划。【原文：Shell and ​Exxon Mobil ‌have halted a planned sale of ‌their natural gas ​assets in Britain's Southern ‍North Sea to Viaro Energy, Shell ⁠said ‍in a statement on ‌Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家：北京要求中国企业停止使用美国和以色列的网络安全软件
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国当局已要求国内企业停止使用约十余家美国和以色列公司生产的网络安全软件，此举出于国家安全考虑。【原文：Chinese authorities have told domestic companies to stop using cybersecurity software made by roughly a dozen firms from the U.S. and Israel due to national security concerns, two people briefed on the matter said.】

item.title: 对冲基金在2025年仍持有大量拥挤的科技股头寸，Hazeltree报告称
item.description: 数据科技公司Hazeltree周三发布的报告显示，去年对冲基金持续持有谷歌母公司Alphabet、微软和Meta等大型科技股的超额多头头寸，同时对IBM和Strategy等公司保持做空押注。【原文：Hedge funds held on to heavily crowded long bets in large-cap tech stocks last year such as Google-parent Alphabet , Microsoft , and Meta , while short-bets persisted in the likes of IBM and Strategy, a report by data and tech firm Hazeltree showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: Jollibee首席财务官表示，业务增长为国际业务2027年在美国上市提供支撑
item.description: 菲律宾快餐集团Jollibee Foods Corp周三表示，其国际业务"已具备独立运营条件"。该公司全球首席财务官称，该集团正筹备将海外业务分拆，计划于2027年底在美国交易所上市。【原文：Jollibee Foods Corp's international business is "ready to be a standalone", its global chief financial officer said on Wednesday, as the Philippine fast-food group prepares to spin off overseas operations to list on a U.S. exchange in late 2027.】

item.title: RWE与KKR启动英国海上风电项目长期合作
item.description: 德国能源巨头RWE周三宣布，已同意将其诺福克先锋西区和东区海上风电项目的50%股权出售给投资机构KKR。此前，这家德国能源公司在英国一场具有里程碑意义的可再生能源招标中成为中标方之一。【原文：RWE said on Wednesday it agreed to sell a 50% stake in its Norfolk Vanguard West and East offshore wind projects to investor KKR , after the German utility emerged as one of the winners in a milestone British renewables auction.】

item.title: 丰田汽车集团旗下公司将对丰田工业的收购报价提高15%
item.description: 丰田汽车集团旗下企业电装公司周三宣布，将把对集团企业丰田工业的要约收购价格提高至每股18,800日元（约合118.11美元），作为将这家叉车制造商私有化计划的一部分。【原文：Toyota Motor group company Denso will raise its tender offer price for group firm Toyota Industries to 18,800 yen ($118.11) per share as part of its plan to take the forklift maker private, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本央行将自保置于与美联储鲍威尔团结之上
item.description: 日本央行缺席了各国央行支持美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔的行列，这既反映出其对政治的回避，也体现了日本政府在临近提前大选之际不愿得罪美国的态度。【原文：The Bank of Japan's absence from a list of central banks lining up to support Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell reflects its aversion to politics and the government's reluctance to cross the U.S., with an early election on the horizon.】

item.title: 奥迪2025年交付量下滑
item.description: 大众汽车旗下高端品牌奥迪周三表示，受关税政策和竞争激烈的市场环境影响，2025年其汽车交付量同比下降2.9%。【原文：Volkswagen's premium brand Audi saw a 2.9% decline in vehicle deliveries in 2025, impacted by tariffs and the competitive market environment, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 研究表明：150年后，蒸汽机仍是德国薪资与创新差距的根源
item.description: 蒸汽机问世已久，至今仍在塑造德国经济格局。最新研究表明，早期采用该技术的地区仍保持着竞争优势，这暗示着人工智能的早期应用或将带来类似效益。【原文：The steam engine is still shaping Germany's economy long after its invention with a new study saying areas that adopted the technology early still carry advantages, suggesting that early adoption of AI could bring similar benefits.】

item.title: 中国汽车销量与出口量预计将在2026年趋缓
item.description: 中国汽车行业协会周三表示，受需求疲软和外部不确定性持续影响，中国汽车销量和出口增速将放缓。【原文：China's vehicle sales and exports are headed for a slowdown amid sluggish demand and lingering external uncertainties, a major Chinese industry association said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据报道，亚马逊将对意大利的罚款提出上诉，即使罚款金额已下调。
item.description: 据意大利《金融报》周三报道，美国电商巨头亚马逊将对意大利法院的裁决提出上诉。该法院此前将该国反垄断监管机构开出的罚款金额予以减免，而亚马逊认为自己根本不应被处以罚款。【原文：U.S. e-commerce giant Amazon will appeal against a decision by an Italian court that reduced a fine imposed by the country's antitrust regulator as it believes it should not be charged at all, Italian daily MF reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 马斯克称特斯拉自2月14日起将仅提供月付制自动驾驶软件
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆·马斯克周三表示，这家电动汽车制造商的完全自动驾驶（FSD）软件将于2月14日之后仅以月度订阅形式提供。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on Wednesday that the electric vehicle maker's full self-driving (FSD) software will only be available as a monthly subscription after February 14.】

item.title: 独家：印尼网约车行业或因总统令草案面临重大调整
item.description: 据两名消息人士透露，印度尼西亚总统普拉博沃·苏比安托正在审议的一项法令草案将大幅提高该国数百万网约车司机的经济和社会福利，这将威胁到网约车平台在东南亚最大市场的盈利能力。【原文：Millions of Indonesian ride-hailing drivers would receive major increases to financial and social benefits under a draft decree being considered by President Prabowo Subianto, two sources said, threatening the profitability of ride-sharing platforms in their largest market in Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称中国海关告知英伟达H200芯片不得入境
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国海关本周告知报关行，英伟达H200人工智能芯片不得进入中国。【原文：Chinese customs authorities told customs agents this week that Nvidia's H200 artificial intelligence chips are not permitted to enter China, according to three people briefed on the matter.】

item.title: 萨克斯全球建筑师理查德·贝克告别斑驳的遗产
item.description: 贝克在零售与房地产投资的交叉领域拥有漫长的职业生涯，期间既有早期取得的重大成功，也有近年遭遇的惨痛失败。【原文：Baker has had a long ​career at the intersection of retail and real estate investment, including some big early wins and, more recently, some crushing losses.】
